item.title: Zelensky Opens Way to Demilitarized Zone in Eastern Ukraine to Reach Peace
item.description: The offer was the closest Mr. Zelensky has come to addressing the thorny territorial disputes in Donetsk that have repeatedly derailed peace talks.

item.title: Blast Kills Three in Moscow Near Site of General’s Car Bombing
item.description: Two police officers died in the explosion, the authorities said. Earlier this week a car bomb killed a military commander in the same area of Russia’s...

item.title: The Year America Blew Up the Process
item.description: The 2025 revolt against process signaled the final collapse of a powerful idea that once promised to hold the country together.

item.title: A Christmas Argument That Ended in Harmony
item.description: Standing together on behalf of those who flee oppression is a very Christmas thing to do.

item.title: China Is Shifting Its Nuclear Forces to Swifter Footing, Pentagon Says
item.description: The country’s production of nuclear warheads has slowed, but its missiles may be poised to strike back fast in case of an attack, an annual assessment...
